gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `TechnicalProvisions` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `TechnicalProvisions` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `TechnicalProvisionsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ProvisionsAdditions` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ProvisionsAdditions')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ProvisionsAdditions return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsAdditionsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsAdditionsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsAdditionsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsAdditionsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ProvisionsWithdrawals` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ProvisionsWithdrawals')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ProvisionsWithdrawals return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsWithdrawalsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsWithdrawalsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsWithdrawalsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsWithdrawalsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`TechnicalProvisionsMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_TechnicalProvisionsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_TechnicalProvisionsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
